channel.title: After effects - beginners sky replacement
channel.description:
[center]After Effects Beginnings of sky replacement
[img]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/1299/compare2vn5.png[/img][/center]
In this tutorial, you will learn how to replace simple, monotoned skies into a world filled with clouds. It is basic, and teaches you step by step how to motion track your movie and make a picture (clouds) seem to be [i]ON[/i] the background/foreground. It is roughly done, just to show you the techniques. When I actually try these, I spend alot of time making sure everything is perfect. I used shaky, and zooming footage, to show how versatile this technique is (It's much easier without the zoom, or if you have a tripod).
Link: grr.. I uploaded the wrong one.. I'll get it back up.
Follow ups: If you want a follow up tutorial on how to remove that pesky telephone pole, I could do one tomorrow... You could also make the clouds move a little bit while the shot progresses, and If you need any help with that just ask me as well.

item.title: After effects - beginners sky replacement
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[center]After Effects
Beginnings of sky replacement

[/center]

In this tutorial, you will learn how to replace simple, monotoned skies into a world filled with clouds.
It is basic, and teaches you step by step how to motion track your movie and make a picture (clouds) seem to be ON the background/foreground. It is roughly done, just to show you the techniques. When I actually try these, I spend alot of time making sure everything is perfect.
I used shaky, and zooming footage, to show how versatile this technique is (It’s much easier without the zoom, or if you have a tripod).

Link: grr… I uploaded the wrong one…
I’ll get it back up.

Follow ups:
If you want a follow up tutorial on how to remove that pesky telephone pole, I could do one tomorrow…
You could also make the clouds move a little bit while the shot progresses, and If you need any help with that just ask me as well.
